title: Medicago, GSK post positive midphase data on plant-derived COVID-19 vaccine
author: Nick Paul Taylor
description: Medicago and GlaxoSmithKline have presented interim phase 2 data on their adjuvanted COVID-19 vaccine candidate. | Medicago and GlaxoSmithKline have presented interim phase 2 data on their adjuvanted COVID-19 vaccine candidate. The results suggest the plant-derived jab CoVLP+AS03 is somewhat differentiated from other vaccines through the mixed cellular response it triggers.
